8ball.helpText: reaches into the future to find the answers to your questions. It knows what will be, and is willing to share this with you (e.g. `8ball Will senpai ever notice me?`).

compliment.helpText: gives a random compliment to the user of your choice (e.g. `compliment @Code`).

draw.helpText: pulls a certain number of cards (up to 10) randomly from a deck (e.g. `draw 4`). You can specify 'jokers' after the number if you want to include jokers in the deck (e.g. `draw 4 jokers`).

quote.helpText: Records or retrieves a user's quotable quotes.

roll.helpText: throws some dice. Specify the number of dice to roll (between 1 and 20) and the number of sides the dice will have (from d3 to d100) after the command (e.g. `roll 4 d20`).
